thumb.name: Happy Holidays Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor%3Cbr%3EBrandy%3Cbr%3Eand Her%3Cbr%3ESpecial%3Cbr%3EFamily%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay your home be filled%3Cbr%3Ewith happiness%3Cbr%3Eand your hearts be filled%3Cbr%3Ewith love %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eat Christmas and always!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Beautiful Season

thumb.name: My Christmas Wishes for You Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo Wish You%3Cbr%3E a Merry Christmas.%3Cbr%3ESteve%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI wish you%3Cbr%3Eall the joys %3Cbr%3Eof Christmas.%3Cbr%3EI wish you%3Cbr%3Ethe best%3Cbr%3Elife has to offer%3Cbr%3Ein the new year.%3Cbr%3EI wish you%3Cbr%3Ehappiness%3Cbr%3Etoday and always.

thumb.name: Season's Greetings Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays.%3Cbr%3EMartha...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;The lamps are lit. %3Cbr%3Ethe fires burn bright. %3Cbr%3EThe house is full%3Cbr%3Eof love and light.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGreetings of the season%3Cbr%3Ewith a wish for nothing less%3Cbr%3EThan all that fills your holidays%3Cbr%3Ewith joy and happiness.

thumb.name: Family Greeting
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Holidays. Adrian%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EGreetings and best wishes to you and your family for a wonderful holiday season.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Christmastime Hi Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Chris%3Cbr%3Efrom the Hansens%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Christmastime%3Cbr%3E Hi...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'Cause you're special --%3Cbr%3Ethat's why!
